titles.title: Water Assistance from International Vessels for Emergency Response Act
A bill to provide a statutory waiver of compliance with the Jones Act to foreign flagged vessels assisting in responding to the Deepwater Horizon oil spill.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 6/18/2010--Introduced. Water Assistance from International Vessels for Emergency Response Act - Waives requirements for coastwise endorsements to a certificate of documentation in order to engage in coastwise trade for foreign vessels engaged in containment, remediation, or associated activities in connection with the mobile offshore drilling unit Deepwater Horizon oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
